snippet: One McDonald’s restaurant in the Haight district, bordering Golden Gate Park, has called for police assistance 412 times in the past year. Neighbors say the situation is becoming worse.
lead_paragraph: One McDonald’s restaurant in the Haight district, bordering Golden Gate Park, has called for police assistance 412 times in the past year. Neighbors say the situation is becoming worse.

headline.seo: At One San Francisco McDonald’s, Calls to the Police Have Been Supersized
headline.main: At One McDonald’s, Even Calls to the Police Have Been Supersized
headline.print_headline: At One McDonald’s, Even Calls to the Police Have Been Supersized
